Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_AdzukiBean: Adzuki Bean/90/10/Vegetable -75/Adzuki Bean/This bean creates a sweet paste when it's mashed.////104/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects

Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Barley: Barley/25/-300/Vegetable -75/Barley/A dark grain that has a more earthy taste when processed than wheat.////114/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_BellPepper: Bell Pepper/70/15/Fruits -79/Bell Pepper/The tamest pepper on the scale. A delicious addition to many meals!////12/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects

Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Celery: Celery/70/8/Vegetable -75/Celery/Crisp and refreshing, it has little inherent taste on its own.////40/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Chickpea: Chickpea/55/-300/Vegetable -75/Chickpea/A coastal stable. Roasted or boiled, they have a slightly nutty and salty taste.////62/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects

Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_SummerSquashStarte: Summer Squash Starter/87/-300/Seeds -74/Summer Squash Starter/Plant these in summer. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after the first harvest.////143/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_SweetPotatoSeeds: Sweet Potato Seeds/45/-300/Seeds -74/Sweet Potato Seeds/Plant these in fall. Takes 8 days to mature.////45/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_TabascoPepperSeeds: Tabasco Pepper Seeds/65/-300/Seeds -74/Tabasco Pepper Seeds/Plant these in fall. Takes 10 days to mature, and continues to produce after the first harvest.////187/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_WasabiTuber: Wasabi Tuber/50/-300/Seeds -74/Wasabi Tuber/Plant these in summer. Takes 8 days to mature.////141/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_WatermelonSeeds: Watermelon Seeds/125/-300/Seeds -74/Watermelon Seeds/Plant these in summer. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after the first harvest.////15/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_ZucchiniSeeds: Zucchini Seeds/112/-300/Seeds -74/Zucchini Seeds/Plant these in fall. Takes 14 days to mature, and continues to produce after the first harvest.////117/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Almond: Almond/90/12/Forage -81/Almond/A drupe consisting of an outer hull and a hard shell with the seed within.////97/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Cashew: Cashew/100/12/Forage -81/Cashew/A buttery nut that buds at the bottom of the cashew apple.////99/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_CinnamonSticks: Cinnamon Sticks/140/-300/Forage -81/Cinnamon Sticks/Its scent is uniquely warming, uplifting, and stimulating, and its flavor sweet and delicious.////149/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_CocoaPod: Cocoa Pod/125/-300/Forage -81/Cocoa Pod/The pod obtained from a cocoa tree. Mmm! Who's ready to make some chocolate?////1/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Pecan: Pecan/125/12/Forage -81/Pecan/A savory nut with a striped seed. Do you own a nutcracker?////169/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Pistachio: Pistachio/90/12/Forage -81/Pistachio/A versatile and delicious nut that can be eaten as is or used to flavor other products.////147/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Walnut: Walnut/90/12/Forage -81/Walnut/A nut that makes delicious candies and pies. It's often used in the filling of sweet treats.////101/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Avocado: Avocado/200/20/Fruit -79/Avocado/A soft plant that's a popular topping and addition to many meals. It's particular loved by younger generations.////51/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Breadfruit: Breadfruit/200/15/Fruit -79/Breadfruit/A relative of the jackfruit. It has a robust flavor that is surprisingly fruity and sweet.////195/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_DragonFruit: Dragon Fruit/125/40/Fruit -79/Dragon Fruit/Also called a pitaya, this is the fruit of a large cactus.////49/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Durian: Durian/200/40/Fruit -79/Durian/A smelly fruit with a spiky husk. ////193/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Fig: Fig/100/15/Fruit -79/Fig/A small and sweet fruit polinated by wasps. It's soft and delicious.////27/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Grapefruit: Grapefruit/140/15/Fruit -79/Grapefruit/A large bitter fruit, high in Vitamin C. Are you a salty or sugary kind of person?////173/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Lemon: Lemon/50/15/Fruit -79/Lemon/A tangy citrus fruit that's used to make lemonade.////25/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Lime: Lime/50/15/Fruit -79/Lime/The tarter cousin of the lemon. It's often used as an accent to numerous dishes.////73/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Lychee: Lychee/110/15/Fruit -79/Lychee/A tropical fruit with a unique appearance. Peel them first!////197/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Nectarine: Nectarine/140/15/Fruit -79/Nectarine/A tangy relative of the peach, it's smooth instead of fuzzy.////75/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Olive: Olive/50/12/Fruit -79/Olive/It's packed with vitamins! Olives are used to make oil and salads.////3/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Papaya: Papaya/135/15/Fruit -79/Papaya/A tropical fruit from the rainforest. It has a sweet flavor and a lot of natural juiciness.////5/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Pear: Pear/135/15/Fruit -79/Pear/A mildly sweet fruit that grows in the winter. Let it ripen for a few days before eating.////29/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Persimmon: Persimmon/155/15/Fruit -79/Persimmon/A somewhat uncommon fruit filled with a honey-like flavor.////53/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Plantain: Plantain/175/30/Fruit -79/Plantain/A relative of the banana. It can be starchy.////125/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Pomelo: Pomelo/80/40/Fruit -79/Pomelo/A really large, not so bitter, cousin of the grapefruit.////171/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Ume: Ume/50/15/Fruit -79/Ume/A type of plum that can be eaten fresh or pickled!////123/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
Entries.MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies_Yuzu: Yuzu/40/15/Fruit -79/Yuzu/A citrus fruit that's related to the lemon, but sweeter.////121/Mods\MizuLeo.FruitsVeggies\Objects
